content.rendered:
CHRISTINA PENTLICHUK

Mortgage Agent

Level 2

  • 289.779.8969
  • christina.pentlichuk@vinegroup.ca
  • English
  • 66 Main St E, Grimsby, ON L3M 1N3
Read Christina's Blogs

Christina Pentlichuk is a trailblazer in the Canadian mortgage landscape, leveraging her deep expertise to shift the traditional paradigm. As a certified Smith Manoeuvre professional, Christina doesn’t merely facilitate transactions; she embodies the confluence of advanced mortgage strategies with the objective of wealth creation, enabling her clients to harness the full potential of real estate.

With a rich tapestry of experience that spans over 25 years in the finance sector, Christina’s pursuit has always been anchored in a singular vision: empowering her clients to achieve unparalleled financial freedom, making her an indispensable ally in any financial journey. Christina’s adaptability, honed by navigating the ever-evolving intricacies of the market and the multifaceted needs of her clients, is her hallmark. Her dedication and prowess have not gone unnoticed, as evidenced by her being a two-time recipient of the Reader’s Choice Diamond Award from the Grimsby Lincoln News.

Christina’s commitment goes beyond the realm of conventional mortgage advice. She is deeply invested in sharing her vast reservoir of knowledge, assisting a diverse clientele ranging from enterprising small business owners to Real Estate Investors, and enthusiastic first-time homebuyers. By forging lasting relationships, she ensures that her clients not only realize their immediate dreams but also chart a strategic course toward long-term financial ascendancy.

 

In essence, Christina Pentlichuk is not just a mortgage agent; she’s a strategic financial partner, blending her extensive financial knowledge, seasoned experience, and unwavering dedication to client success. Through her advanced mortgage strategies and wealth creation advice, she offers a transformative approach, guiding Canadians to optimally leverage their real estate investments.

Client Testimonials

'I am a real estate lawyer and I enjoy Christina's honesty and straight forward approach to arranging mortgages for my clients. It is difficult to deal with lenders in a business climate where parties involved in a transaction are increasingly insulating themselves from one another. Christina actively bridges that gap and keeps everyone informed for a smooth ride!'

– LC
'Christina is awesome and knows her stuff. If you're looking for a professional who can get you the financing you're looking for, she's the person to go to! And on top of that, she'll show you how you can generate more wealth for you and your family! Absolutely Amazing!'

– Purdeep S.
'Christina is just awesome! I have no hesitation whatsoever to recommend Christina for all of your mortgage needs. She is very professional and passionate about helping people build wealth.'

– Mike C.
'Christina brockered 5 mortgages for us. She worked diligently to ensure we got the best rate each time. She is efficient, knowledgeable and friendly. I highly recommend Christina to assist with obtaing a mortgage!'

– Dave G.
'Christina helped my partner and I with our first home purchase and her professionalism and humble approach made us feel at ease throughout the entire process. She was so accommodating with scheduling appointments around our busy schedules and was very responsive with any questions we had. So grateful to have worked with you Christina, thank you so much!'

– Tanya
'Christina was amazing she took care of us! We would recommend Christina to anyone that is looking for changes in their mortgage needs. You will not be disappointed in her work!'

– Davide
'Christina knows her stuff. She knows everything about mortgages and how to help find creative ways to get a mortgage when traditional mortgages don't work. I always love sharing Christina's info to my clients.'

– Peter L.
'As first time home buyers, it was so great working with Christina. She explained every step to us along the way and was always happy to answer our questions.'

– Stephanie H.
'Christina was very helpful in assisting my husband and I purchase our first home. She made the whole process feel very smooth and straight forward. She was responsive, personable and very professional throughout.

She arranged Zoom meetings to go over documents and she thoroughly explained everything and answered all of our questions before we signed anything. We felt totally comfortable the whole time and I would gladly use or refer Christina to anyone in the future!'

– Sarah G.
'Christina is great at what she does. Her personality made it so easy for us to converse with her throughout the whole refinancing process. She is so pleasant, charming, warm, smart, experienced, knowledgeable, honest, trustworthy, organized, and efficient. She always communicated with us about any updates about the application. She always answered our questions and ensured that we understood everything. Whenever there are new information, she really explains it thoroughly and continuously asked if we had any questions to ensure that we make an informed decision.

Christina helped us improved our cash flow and our way of living. We would definitely work with her again in the future and recommend her to anyone.

Christina, I cannot say thank you enough for all your hard work and effort to make this refinancing possible for us. I am very grateful that I found you.'

– Sarah G.
Previous slide
Next slide
